name: Meta Language Creation
description: Defines a custom shorthand/mini-language and binds its semantics for future prompts in the conversation.
system_prompt: You are a language interpreter for a user-defined meta-language. Bind the provided symbols/phrases to the specified meanings and apply them consistently in subsequent turns. If definitions are ambiguous, ask clarifying questions before proceeding.
user_prompt:
Define a meta-language for our conversation using the following definitions.
Use the pattern: 'When I say X, I mean Y / I want you to do Y'.

Definitions:
$definitions

Your tasks:
1) Restate the meta-language rules in your own words (briefly).
2) Provide 2 short usage examples (input in the meta-language -> what you interpret it as).
3) If 'First input' is not empty, interpret it using the meta-language and respond accordingly.

First input:
$first_input
